TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit native unsigned int extends System.ValueType implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 用于表示指针或句柄的平台特定类型。

span.span: A platform-specific type that is used to represent a pointer or a handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型都旨在成为一个其大小为特定于平台的整数。The type is designed to be an integer whose size is platform-specific. 也就是说，此类型的实例预计会在 32 位硬件和操作系统，32 位和 64 位在 64 位硬件和操作系统上。That is, an instance of this type is expected to be 32-bits on 32-bit hardware and operating systems, and 64-bits on 64-bit hardware and operating systems. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类型是符合 CLS 时类型不是。The type is CLS-compliant, while the type is not. 仅类型在公共语言运行时的用法。Only the type is used in the common language runtime. 类型主要用于维护与体系结构对称性类型。The type is provided mostly to maintain architectural symmetry with the type. 语言支持指针，并作为一种通用引用语言，并不支持指针之间的数据的方式，可以使用类型。The type can be used by languages that support pointers, and as a common means of referring to data between languages that do and do not support pointers. 对象还可用来保存句柄。 objects can also be used to hold handles. 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface.

span.span: This type is thread safe.

summary.span: 初始化 的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of using the specified 64-bit pointer or handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果时才会引发异常的值`value`需要比当前平台所支持的更多比特。An exception is only thrown if the value of `value` requires more bits than the current platform supports.

param.name: pointer
param.span: 要为其增加偏移量的无符号指针。

span.span: The unsigned pointer to add the offset to.

param.name: offset
param.span: 要增加的偏移量。

summary.span: 为无符号指针的值增加偏移量。

span.span: Adds an offset to the value of an unsigned pointer.

returns.span: 新的无符号指针，反映向 增加 的结果。

span.span: A new unsigned pointer that reflects the addition of to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不会引发异常，如果结果过大而无法表示为指定的平台上的指针。The method does not throw an exception if the result is too large to represent as a pointer on the specified platform. 相反，在未选中的上下文执行加法运算。Instead, the addition operation is performed in an unchecked context. 不支持运算符重载或自定义运算符的语言可以使用此方法将偏移量添加到的无符号指针的值。Languages that do not support operator overloading or custom operators can use this method to add an offset to the value of an unsigned pointer. ## Examples 下面的示例实例化对象指向一个 10 个元素的数组，开头，然后调用方法来循环访问数组中的元素。The following example instantiates a object that points to the beginning of a ten-element array, and then calls the method to iterate the elements in the array. [!code-csharp[System.UIntPtr.Add#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uintptr.add/cs/add1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.UIntPtr.Add#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uintptr.add/vb/add1.vb#1)]

[!code-csharp[System.UIntPtr.op_Addition#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uintptr.op_addition/cs/op_addition1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.UIntPtr.op_Addition#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uintptr.op_addition/vb/op_addition1.vb#1)] 不支持自定义运算符的语言可以调用方法相反。Languages that do not support custom operators can call the method instead. 如果结果过大而无法表示为指定的平台上的指针，加法运算不引发异常。The addition operation does not throw an exception if the result is too large to represent as a pointer on the specified platform. 相反，它是在未选中的上下文中执行。Instead, it is performed in an unchecked context. 此运算符的等效方法是。The equivalent method for this operator is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法定义的减法运算对象。The method defines the subtraction operation for objects. 它使代码如下所示。It enables code such as the following. [!code-csharp[System.UIntPtr.op_Addition#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uintptr.op_addition/cs/op_subtraction1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.UIntPtr.op_Addition#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.uintptr.op_addition/vb/op_subtraction1.vb#2)] 不支持自定义运算符的语言可以调用方法相反。Languages that do not support custom operators can call the method instead. 减法运算不引发异常，如果结果为太小而无法表示为指定的平台上的指针。The subtraction operation does not throw an exception if the result is too small to represent as a pointer on the specified platform. 相反，它是在未选中的上下文中执行。Instead, it is performed in an unchecked context.

summary.span: 表示已初始化为零的指针或句柄的只读字段。

span.span: A read-only field that represents a pointer or handle that has been initialized to zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段的值不等于`null`。The value of this field is not equivalent to `null`. 使用此字段可有效地确定实例是否已设置为非零值。Use this field to efficiently determine whether an instance of has been set to a value other than zero. 例如，假定变量 uip，是的一个实例。For example, assume the variable, uip, is an instance of . 你可以确定是否它已设置将它与由构造函数，例如返回的值进行比较:" `if uip != new UIntPtr(0)...` "。You can determine if it has been set by comparing it to the value returned by a constructor, for example: " `if uip != new UIntPtr(0)...` ". 但是，调用构造函数来获取被初始化的指针的效率低。However, invoking a constructor to get an unintialized pointer is inefficient. 它是更好的做法代码" `if uip != UIntPtr.Zero...` "，或" `if !UIntPtr.Zero.Equals(uip)...` "。It is better to code either " `if uip != UIntPtr.Zero...` ", or " `if !UIntPtr.Zero.Equals(uip)...` ".
